pr_title: [Contract] Update Contract for DNS/Router, Resolve Discrepancy

timeline.message: update contract per discussion, also address some point on #386

timeline.bodyText: Instead of "!!!", let us use //TODO to remind us for real.
timeline.author: xieus

replies.bodyText: @kevin-zhonghao can help to add this in next DPM change.
replies.author: xieus

replies.bodyText: Fixed. I like to use !!! to get people's attention. :)
replies.author: er1cthe0ne

timeline.author: xieus

replies.bodyText: see end of number 4 of #386. The idea is DPM will stamp a version number (101), and then ACA will look at it to ensure compability, this will enable ACA to print a meaningful error message. And it will save us to trouble trying to figure out incompatability goalstate message.
replies.author: er1cthe0ne

replies.bodyText:
Okay this top-level format version may increase in the future therefore we would likely need to make it configurable.
Also, GoalStateManager is used by v1.0 so we would need to make a similar change to v2.0.
replies.author: xieus

replies.bodyText:
okay, let me know if I should make the configurable change (please give me some pointer to do it).
I made the v2.0 change in DataPlanceServiceImpl.java and updated the PR.
replies.author: er1cthe0ne

replies.bodyText:
Sure. Here are three steps to make the change:
(1) Define a configuration in application.properties with default value
https://github.com/futurewei-cloud/alcor/blob/master/services/data_plane_manager/src/main/resources/application.properties
(2) "Autowire" the configuration to a java config class
https://github.com/futurewei-cloud/alcor/blob/master/services/data_plane_manager/src/main/java/com/futurewei/alcor/dataplane/config/Config.java
(3) Assign the config value in the code to a local variable, for example,

  
    
      alcor/services/data_plane_manager/src/main/java/com/futurewei/alcor/dataplane/client/grpc/DataPlaneClientImpl.java
    
    
         Line 49
      in
      ff19c6b
    
    
    
    

        
          
           public DataPlaneClientImpl(Config globalConfig) {
replies.author: xieus

timeline.bodyText: Let us add //TODO to remind us we need to set DNS based on latest contract.
timeline.author: xieus

timeline.bodyText: Please add //TODO comment as well as this is the v2.0 implementation.
timeline.author: xieus

timeline.message: change MessageType to UpdateType in all proto files
